item.title: How to fix the Matrix Errors
item.dc:creator: @Abbyys Abbyys
item.description:
@Abbyys wrote:

As I was writing this off a tablet and not a laptop or computer, I couldn’t upload the libs file, hence I attached a link directing you to a source in which I know will work, as it was the source I used. I never called myself a genius at all sk8rdude. But seeing as the majority of the 20 odd pages of comments on the matrix source release were “errors how to fix working this trade working that” I figured I’d atleast help the community, like the same way someone from the community helped me.

It is a tutorial, as it tells people step by step what they can do to stop them recieving compiling errors, and running errors when running and compiling the Matrix Server and Client released by Alex. So if you’ve nothing better to do than to be sarcastic, when I write a tutorial to tell people what to do to stop themselves getting errors, as a lot of them either had no idea, or were editing files to fix them, then fuck off this thread and keep your comments to yourself.

I never said I was a genius, I was helping. So piss off.

Read full topic
item.source: How to fix the Matrix Errors

item.title: How to fix the Matrix Errors
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“alex-futureX, post:6, topic:449492”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=552390.msg4047311#msg4047311 date=1342191541]

This makes no difference at all.

yes it does they were missing the libs

So he wrote an entire “tutorial” for a few missing files?
What a genius!
[/quote]

I don’t see you helping anyone - Why don’t you just appreciate what people release. So you wrote a reply to call him a genius? - What a dick.[/quote]
I don’t see you doing anything either. Sucks to be called out eh?

I don’t touch this high of a server. Never really got to a 474 even. So how would I know there are errors on this eh?
Plus, he could have zipped the libs folder and put it on uppit. Woah wait, that’s hard.
Sorry it’s to complex for you.

This isn’t even a tut.

item.title: How to fix the Matrix Errors
item.dc:creator: @Abbyys Abbyys
item.description:
@Abbyys wrote:

Credits First:-

99.8% DragonKK for the files.
0.1% Alex for help. (Other Alex).
0.1% Me for writing this tutorial.

Download the Server and Client files from here:-

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Download another 667 Server and Client. For an example, I’m posting NRS3, but any one will do:-

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Extract all the files, then go into the other 667 server files. Copy the libs folder into the Matrix server files folder.

Do the same with the client, copy the 667 client libs folder into the 718 client folder.

Enjoy your working source with no errors.
If you need any run’s or whatnot, use these.

Server Run:

@echo off
title Matrix
echo Launching Server…
“C:/Program Files/Java/jre7/bin/java.exe” -Xmx512m -cp bin;lib/*; com.rs.Launcher true true false
pause

Server Compile:

@echo off
title Matrix Compiler
echo Compiling Matrix…
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_04\bin\javac.exe” -d bin -cp lib/; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/.java
@echo Finished.
pause

Client Compiler:

@echo off
title compile
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_04/bin/javac” -cp lib/; -d bin -sourcepath src src/client.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_04/bin/javac” -cp lib/; -d bin -sourcepath src src/Loader.java
@pause

Client Run;

@echo off
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe” -Xmx256m -Xss2m -Dsun.java2d.noddraw=true -XX:CompileThreshold=1500 -Xincgc -XX:+UseConcMarkSweepGC -XX:+UseParNewGC -cp bin;./clientlibs.jar; Loader
pause

Et voila.

Read full topic
item.source: How to fix the Matrix Errors
